name: dockerized-neo4j-with-nextjs-leaflet
description: This project is a simple example of how to work with [Neo4j](https://neo4j.com), [Next.js](https://nextjs.org), and the map visualization library [React Leaflet](https://react-leaflet.js.org) within a [Docker](https://www.docker.com) environment.
author: RobÂ Brennan <rob@therobbrennan.com> (therobbrennan.com)

scripts.docker:neo4j:cypher-shell: docker exec -ti dockerized-neo4j cypher-shell -u neo4j -p letmein
scripts.docker:destroy:global: docker system prune -f --volumes && docker image prune -a -f
scripts.nuke: clear && npm run docker:destroy:global && npm run dev
